attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP NO LONGER MAGA 2020
attributes.review: terrible, terrible app. i am no longer voting for trump in the 2020 election. i am so disappointed in his app making that i see no reason for him to be in office, if he can run w country, he can at least run an app correctly. very stinky, so disappointed.

attributes.title: trash🥰
attributes.review: this app is absolute garbage. there’s no reason to download it. i saw something that was telling me to download it and if i did then i would be put on the Ellen show but that didn’t happen. i am completely outraged🙄 have a nice day😘

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: Everytime I try to open the app it causes my phone to crash and completely restart! I don’t recommend downloading if you value your phone. Also it called my mom a bad word.

attributes.title: this app is terrible/Racist🥱🥱
attributes.review: I’m sorry mr president but when I tried to text you it wouldn’t let me I’ve tried countless of times and I’m tired of waiting so I deleted the app and I’m giving it one star (it think it has something to do with my race 😌😳) ✨ gęñž2020

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. Not to mention the bad set up and glitches but the person it is about? BARF. Imagine being so self centered you would want an app about yourself. Let’s finally begin to make America acceptable by getting rid of tr*mp as the president.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is so bad every time I like try to go onto the page it like glitches and I’m kind of wondering why but if it doesn’t work why is it still on the App Store this app should just be deleted it’s no good

attributes.title: trash app😪
attributes.review: i was curious about why this app was getting so many one stars so i downloaded it myself to see if the comments were true. and sure enough my skin started getting an orangish tint to it, words like “all lives matter” and “grab her by the 😾” threatened to come out my mouth, and i literally felt my brain just stop working for a hot second! all in all would not get this app even if it meant saving my grandmother and she would understand☺️

I downloaded this app because I was informed a large Barney accompanied by big bird would appear near me and hit whomever I choose with a freshly caught fish. I am greatly disappointed by the result, not only did Barney nor big bird show up I was the one who got hit by a fish.

attributes.title: What is this?!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to seehow it would function and how Donald Trump plans to ruin our country. He is not making “America Great Agian”  to me America was fine until he came along. Please this app has no meaning. Literally. The app was also not it. ✨trash✨

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to learn more about trump and his plans for our country. However, the app was always crashing making that impossible. Worst experience I’ve ever had with an app.
